thread.title: These Dessert Bars Are Full of Butter, Chocolate, and Canada’s Good Vibes
thread.title_full: These Dessert Bars Are Full of Butter, Chocolate, and Canada’s Good Vibes

author: Munchies Staff
title: These Dessert Bars Are Full of Butter, Chocolate, and Canada’s Good Vibes
text:
These Dessert Bars Are Full of Butter, Chocolate, and Canada’s Good Vibes February 25, 2017 / 5:00 pm By Munchies Staff 
Here at MUNCHIES, Dead Set on Life host Matty Matheson is hands-down our favorite Canadian. 
And what could be more Canadian than a recipe called Snowmobile Squares , which Matty discovered at Brookfield Bakery in Nova Scotia while he shooting an episode of his show? 
There, he got all the secrets on how to make the roadside bakery’s main attraction and we are sharing them with you, beloved audience. RECIPE: Snowmobile Squares 
It’s a recipe that’s as easy to prepare as it is addictive, and it’s sure to awaken your inner Canadian. With 28 tablespoons of butter and a whole pound of chocolate chips in every batch, these squares are guaranteed to light up the pleasure receptors in your brain and trigger all of the compulsive behavior that comes along with that. 
Want to know why they’re called Snowmobile Squares? Then tune into Dead Set on Life at 10 PM on Thursdays, only on VICELAND.
